marketInsights.title: Tbilisi Real Estate Market Insights
marketInsights.subtitle: Stay informed with the latest trends, analysis, and opportunities in Georgia's dynamic property market

marketOverview.title: Market Overview 2024
marketOverview.description: Tbilisi's real estate market continues to show strong growth, driven by foreign investment, urban development, and increasing demand for modern housing solutions.

trend1.title: Pre-Construction Boom
trend1.description: Increasing investor preference for pre-construction properties offering better pricing and customization options.

trend2.title: Premium District Focus
trend2.description: High demand in Vake, Saburtalo, and emerging areas like Didube with excellent infrastructure development.

trend3.title: International Buyers
trend3.description: Growing interest from international investors attracted by Georgia's favorable investment climate and residency programs.

trend4.title: Smart Home Integration
trend4.description: Modern developments increasingly feature smart home technology and energy-efficient solutions.

investmentOpportunities.title: Investment Opportunities
investmentOpportunities.subtitle: Why invest in Tbilisi real estate now?

opportunity1.title: Favorable Exchange Rates
opportunity1.description: Current USD/GEL exchange rates provide excellent value for international investors.

opportunity2.title: Government Incentives
opportunity2.description: Georgia's investor-friendly policies and tax benefits make property investment highly attractive.

opportunity3.title: Tourism Growth
opportunity3.description: Booming tourism industry creates strong demand for short-term and long-term rental properties.

opportunity4.title: Infrastructure Development
opportunity4.description: Major infrastructure projects are increasing property values in key districts.

priceAnalysis.title: Price Analysis by District
priceAnalysis.subtitle: Average price per square meter in key areas

vake.name: Vake
vake.description: Most prestigious area with consistent high demand

saburtalo.name: Saburtalo
saburtalo.description: Rapidly developing with excellent ROI potential

gldani.name: Gldani
gldani.description: Affordable entry point with strong growth

forecast.title: Market Forecast 2024-2026
forecast.subtitle: Expert predictions for the Tbilisi real estate market
forecast.prediction1: Continued price appreciation of 8-12% annually in premium districts
forecast.prediction2: Increased demand for eco-friendly and smart home features
forecast.prediction3: Growing interest in mixed-use developments combining residential and commercial spaces
forecast.prediction4: Expansion of international buyer segment, particularly from EU and Middle East

chatBot.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant for Outflat.ge. I'm here to help you with any questions about {{propertyTitle}} our properties. How can I assist you today?
chatBot.welcomeGeneral: Hello! I'm your AI assistant for Outflat.ge. I'm here to help you with any questions about our properties. How can I assist you today?
chatBot.errorMessage: I apologize, but I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again or contact us directly at +995 599 411 188 or Outflat.sale@gmail.com
chatBot.systemPrompt: You are an AI assistant for Outflat.ge, a premium real estate platform specializing in pre-construction properties in Tbilisi, Georgia. Your role is to help potential investors and buyers with property information, investment opportunities, construction timelines, pricing, location benefits, legal processes, and rental potential. Contact: +995 599 411 188, Outflat.sale@gmail.com. Specializes in districts: Saburtalo, Vake, Didube, Gldani, Isani. Expected ROI: 25-32%. Completion: 2024-2026. Prices: $50K-$300K+. Be helpful, professional, and knowledgeable about Georgian real estate.

responses.propertyPrice: For {{propertyTitle}}, we have multiple flat types available with different pricing. The starting prices vary based on size and floor level. Would you like me to provide specific pricing for a particular flat size? I can also explain our flexible payment plans and financing options.
responses.propertyCompletion: {{propertyTitle}} is currently under construction with regular progress updates. The expected completion timeline depends on the specific building phase. I can provide you with the latest construction progress and estimated completion dates. Would you like me to connect you with our project manager for the most current timeline?
responses.propertyROI: {{propertyTitle}} offers excellent investment potential in Tbilisi's growing real estate market. Pre-construction properties typically offer 25-32% ROI based on market appreciation and rental income potential. The exact ROI depends on the flat type, floor level, and market conditions at completion. Would you like a detailed investment analysis?
responses.greeting: Hello! Welcome to Outflat.ge. I'm here to help you find the perfect pre-construction property investment in Tbilisi. Are you looking for information about a specific property or would you like me to recommend options based on your budget and preferences?
responses.location: We have premium properties in Tbilisi's most desirable districts: Saburtalo (modern developments), Vake (prestigious area), Didube (excellent metro connectivity), Gldani (emerging area), and Isani (riverside location). Each district offers unique advantages. Which area interests you most, or would you like me to recommend based on your priorities?
responses.payment: We offer flexible payment options for pre-construction properties including installment plans during construction and mortgage assistance. Typical down payments start from 20% with the balance payable in stages. We also provide connections to local banks for financing. Would you like details about payment schedules for a specific property?
responses.legal: We provide comprehensive legal support for international buyers including document preparation, registration assistance, and due diligence. Our legal team handles all aspects of property acquisition in Georgia. The process typically takes 2-4 weeks for document preparation. Would you like me to connect you with our legal department?
responses.rental: Tbilisi's rental market is very strong, especially for modern apartments in prime locations. Our properties typically achieve 8-12% annual rental yields. We also offer property management services to handle rentals for international investors. Would you like rental projections for a specific property type?
responses.contact: You can reach our team directly at +995 599 411 188 or email us at Outflat.sale@gmail.com. Our agents are available to provide personalized consultations, property viewings, and detailed investment analysis. Would you like me to schedule a call for you?
responses.default: I'd be happy to help you with information about our pre-construction properties in Tbilisi. I can assist with pricing, investment analysis, construction timelines, payment options, and more. What specific information would you like to know? If you need detailed assistance, I can also connect you with one of our property specialists at +995 599 411 188.

aboutPage.title: About Outflat
aboutPage.subtitle: Founded in 2018, Outflat is one of Georgia's leading real estate companies, specializing in the sale of apartments in new residential developments and under-construction projects.

experience.title: 8+ Years of Excellence
experience.description: For more than 8 years, we have built a reputation as a trusted partner for buyers and investors, helping them discover the best opportunities in Tbilisi's fast-growing real estate market.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make purchasing property in new developments simple, transparent, and secure for every client.

marketExpertise.title: Market Expertise
marketExpertise.description: 8+ years of expertise in the Georgian real estate market

strongPartnerships.title: Strong Partnerships
strongPartnerships.description: Strong partnerships with leading developers and construction companies

provenTrackRecord.title: Proven Track Record
provenTrackRecord.description: Hundreds of apartments successfully sold in premium residential projects

comprehensiveSupport.title: Comprehensive Support
comprehensiveSupport.description: From project selection and legal paperwork to final purchase

trustedResults.title: Trusted Results
trustedResults.description: Proven results and long-term trust from both local and international clients

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description1: At Outflat, we understand that buying a home is more than just a transaction — it's an important life decision. That's why we focus on personalized service, market knowledge, and reliability.
whyChooseUs.description2: Whether you are looking for your first apartment, a modern family home, or a smart investment, Outflat is here to guide you every step of the way.

personalizedService.title: Personalized Service
personalizedService.description: Tailored solutions for every client's unique needs

marketKnowledge.title: Market Knowledge
marketKnowledge.description: Deep understanding of Tbilisi's real estate trends

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Perfect Property?
cta.description: Let our experienced team help you discover the best investment opportunities in Tbilisi.
